imdb.plot outline: After founding the HAN dynasty after Qin dynasty, he has adopted a series of fresh and practical policies that have pursued filial piety domestically, requisite the Confucian scholars and put highly respect on Confucianism, founded the HAN culture, governed the empire world according to proper imperial edicts, widely seek capable people for public services. In the economic side, emperor Bang LIU abolished the harsh Qin Dynasty law, exempted its corvees and lowered the taxes to reduce the economic burden on the people, pro-Huns foreign policy with marriage. He ordered the liberation of slaves, let the common people go homeland, dismissed a large number of soldiers returning to the farm field, reduce the rent on land collecting one tax on fifteen(6.67% tax rate), let the people rehabilitate and build up wealth and strength to recover from the effects of war. So that the people can be cohesion together to support the new HAN dynasty, the state can be consolidated, hence played a decisive role and laid the foundation in the later economic and military development of the world's most prospectus and powerful HAN dynasty, eventually open the trading and culture exchange connection and path with the mighty Rome Empire to the west through the legendary silk road and dominated in Asia and the world at that time, eventually emerged as the great empire with brilliant achievements in the history to win the world's attention.
imdb.title: Legend of The Han Empire
plot: After founding the HAN dynasty after Qin dynasty, he has adopted a series of fresh and practical policies that have pursued filial piety domestically, requisite the Confucian scholars and put highly respect on Confucianism, founded the HAN culture, governed the empire world according to proper imperial edicts, widely seek capable people for public services. In the economic side, emperor Bang LIU abolished the harsh Qin Dynasty law, exempted its corvees and lowered the taxes to reduce the economic burden on the people, pro-Huns foreign policy with marriage. He ordered the liberation of slaves, let the common people go homeland, dismissed a large number of soldiers returning to the farm field, reduce the rent on land collecting one tax on fifteen(6.67% tax rate), let the people rehabilitate and build up wealth and strength to recover from the effects of war. So that the people can be cohesion together to support the new HAN dynasty, the state can be consolidated, hence played a decisive role and laid the foundation in the later economic and military development of the world's most prospectus and powerful HAN dynasty, eventually open the trading and culture exchange connection and path with the mighty Rome Empire to the west through the legendary silk road and dominated in Asia and the world at that time, eventually emerged as the great empire with brilliant achievements in the history to win the world's attention.

Legend of the HAN Empire is an unprecedented and magnificence historical story on the founder of the most powerful and prosperous dynasty in the world history. Bang LIU rose from Grassroots origin, found the HAN dynasty in BC 202 and was throned as the first Emperor of the HAN dynasty in the same year. He is the founder and the great pioneer of HAN nationality and HAN culture. He is also one of greatest and most influenced emperor in world's history.
